forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Rain Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. South wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. West wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
